nodes.text: Pirate's (Muon) Gold was a region of space in the Tatoo system named by the pirates who dwelled there.

The Bestine Pirates loved their Muon Gold. In light of this, the pirates named the area in which they dwelt after the potent spice. Remarkably enough, the Bestine Pirates still fired with amazing accuracy and lethality, so much so that all who traveled through this area of space were wise enough to keep their computer systems alert and weapons armed.
